channel.title: CVE Feed for n/a -- Bhima
channel.description: The latest CVEs for n/a -- Bhima

item.title: CVE-2023-0967|2023-04-05T00:00:00 -- n%2Fa -- bhima
item.description: Bhima version 1.27.0 allows an attacker authenticated with normal user permissions to view sensitive data of other application users and data that should only be viewed by the administrator. This is possible because the application is vulnerable to IDOR, it does not properly validate user permissions with respect to certain actions the user can perform.

item.title: CVE-2023-0959|2023-04-05T00:00:00 -- n%2Fa -- bhima
item.description: Bhima version 1.27.0 allows a remote attacker to update the privileges of any account registered in the application via a malicious link sent to an administrator. This is possible because the application is vulnerable to CSRF.

item.title: CVE-2023-0944|2023-04-05T00:00:00 -- n%2Fa -- bhima
item.description: Bhima version 1.27.0 allows an authenticated attacker with regular user permissions to update arbitrary user session data such as username, email and password. This is possible because the application is vulnerable to IDOR, it does not correctly validate user permissions with respect to certain actions that can be performed by the user.
